descHeading: Veröffentlichen Sie Ihre Service auf dem Catena-X Marktplatz
descMessage: Registrieren Sie Ihren Service und Ihre Metadaten, um auf dem Marktplatz veröffentlicht zu werden. Wenn Sie nach unten scrollen, finden Sie einen ersten Überblick zu dem Service-Freigabeprozess.
startCreatingButton: Beginnen Sie mit der Registrierung Ihres Serviceangebots
stepHeading: Der Prozess führt Sie durch die folgenden Schritte:
dividerText: Beginnen wir mit der Veröffentlichung Ihres Dienstes...
marketplaceHeading: Anforderungen für anstehende Einreichungen im Service Marketplace

step1.headerDescription: Die folgenden Eingabefelder und Uploads werden verwendet, um Ihre Service-'Service Card' zu erstellen, die auf dem Marktplatz platziert wird. Die Servicekarte ist der erste Berührungspunkt mit dem Kunden.

step2.headerDescription: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .
step2.pleaseEnterValidHomePageURL: Bitte geben Sie eine gültige URL ein - eg: https://catena-x.net
step2.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Bitte geben Sie eine gültige Email an

step3.headerDescription: Um Ihren Service auf dem Marktplatz zu veröffentlichen, müssen Sie eine Reihe von Catena-X-spezifischen Vereinbarungen unterzeichnen. Bitte sehen Sie sich die genannten Vereinbarungen an und stimmen Sie diesen über die Checkliste Genehmigung zu.

technicalIntegration.headerDescription: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .
technicalIntegration.technicalUserSetupMandatory: Please select atleast one technical user setup
technicalIntegration.technicalUserProfileError: Error while updating technical user profiles

step4.headerDescription: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard

serviceReleaseForm.OnlyOneFileAllowed: Only one file for upload allowed

error.title: Die Übermittlung war nicht erfolgreich.
error.message: Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut oder kommen Sie später wieder.

submit.headerDescription: Nach einer Überprüfung durch einen Catena-X-Administrator erhalten Sie

serviceoverview.headerTitle: Service Overview - Own managed service offers

serviceSubscription.headline: Service Subscription
serviceSubscription.description: Do you wan't to rather use the autosetup; connect your service to automate marketplace subscription build
serviceSubscription.search: ...search by entering the service name here.
serviceSubscription.subscriptionHeading: >> there are already active subscriptions for the service {serviceName}

document.heading: Relevant Documents
document.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

register.heading: Autosetup URL
register.message: Enter your autosetup url in the input field below to store the autosetup endpoint. The endpoint will get triggered by CX as soon as a interested company is hitting the 'Subscribe' button in the marketplace.
register.providerErrorMessage: Something went wrong! Please try it later again.

activation.heading: Activate Service Subscription
activation.description: Activate the service subscription request of the customer by adding your customer specific service endpoint/url in the input field below. We will use the url to register/activate the service authentication with the CX idp. Additionally you will receive a technical user which can get used to connect the service tenant/connector to the centryl CX components/services (where needed).
activation.successDescription: The technical user has been created with the following data:

declineModal.title: Reject Service Release Request {appName}
declineModal.subheading: Are you sure you want to reject the service release request ?
declineModal.declineReason1Label: Create a notification & email message to inform the service provider/manager about the rejection
declineModal.declineReason2Label: An individual message with additional details can get shared by adding the details into the input field below
declineModal.declineReason3Label: The service will get set back to the status “in progress“

documents.heading: Documents
documents.message: In the following section additional documents/information are shared by the app provider. Click on the document name to download them.

provider.heading: Provider Information
provider.message: If you have any question, want to get in contact or visit the provider website, you can find all necessary information below.

retryOverlay.title: Something went wrong
retryOverlay.description: The data could not get loaded, please try it again or go back to the previous page.
